meanings.definition: relating to or characterized by belief in the existence of a god or gods
meanings.sent1: The theistic view of the world includes the belief in a higher power.
meanings.sent2: She follows a theistic religion that worships multiple deities.
meanings.sent3: The theistic debate at the dinner table was surprisingly lively.
meanings.sent4: His theistic perspective on life colors his every decision.
meanings.sent5: The theistic nature of the ceremony filled the room with a sense of reverence.

meanings.definition: a person who believes in the existence of a god or gods
meanings.sent1: As a theistic, he finds comfort in his faith during difficult times.
meanings.sent2: The theistic prayed daily, seeking guidance from the divine.
meanings.sent3: The theistic's collection of religious texts was extensive.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd, a theistic among skeptics.
meanings.sent5: The theistic's presence brought a sense of peace to the room.
